page.title: 13THERFIELD FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: The School stands in very pleasant grounds to the north of the village green.Since the late sixties,when the 3 tier system was introduced in this area,it has catered for children aged from 4 & half to 9 years,after which they normally transfer to Royston. There are 2 classes:-Infant,4 & half to 7 years approximately; Junior,7 to 9 years.There are 2.1 teachers & part-time staff include a secretary, welfare helper,cook,kitchen assistant, caretaker & a peripatetic music teacher.The number of pupils has varied in recent years from 17 to 40 plus;in 1985 there are 29 on role from Therfield,Kelshall,Royston,Litlington, & Abingdon Piggotts.We aim to create a caring,sharing environment with a broad based curriculum so that our young people may build strong educational foundations.
